name: USA Truck Simulator Car Games
description: Drive and deliver the cargo on your truck to the destination. There will be an arrow guiding you to the drop off zone and once you get to that zone, there will be a big highlighted box telling you where to stop. You will need to race against the clock to deliver the stuff on time, or you will be forced to try again. The graphics of this game are so beautiful and realistic, so we can give you a realistic feel. This is the perfect job simulator game.
